meanings.definition: A person or thing that divides something into three equal parts.
meanings.sent1: The trisectors carefully divided the cake into three equal slices.
meanings.sent2: The trisectors in the math class evenly split the pizza into thirds.
meanings.sent3: The trisectors at the party made sure everyone got an equal share of the snacks.
meanings.sent4: The trisectors of the group discussion ensured each member had an equal opportunity to speak.
meanings.sent5: The trisectors of the treasure map divided the route into three equal parts for each adventurer.

meanings.definition: The act of dividing something into three equal parts.
meanings.sent1: The trisectors of the land divided the property into three equal sections.
meanings.sent2: The trisectors of the tournament split the prize money into thirds.
meanings.sent3: The trisectors of the play rehearsed the scene where the characters split the treasure.
meanings.sent4: The trisectors of the music piece divided the melody into three harmonious parts.
meanings.sent5: The trisectors of the art project ensured each color was evenly distributed across the canvas.
